QuestData.Title: Prepping the Speech
QuestData.Description: High Tinker Mekkatorque asked me to write a speech that he could give before the battle starts, but I can't tell which draft is good and which ones just stink.$B$BCould you try some of them out on some of the local gnome residents? This device creates an image of Mekkatorque saying a few lines from each of my speech drafts.$B$BLet me know which one works, okay?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Gnomish Playback Device in front of Ozzie Togglevolt north of Kharanos, Milli Featherwhistle at Steelgrill Depot and Tog Rustsprocket outside the Kharanos Inn. Return to Toby Ziegear when all the speeches have been given.
